name: Hard 6.5 "The Crane Mutiny" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Woody want in an apartment?
questions.explanation:
living room and bedroom.

	Woody told them that he found a new home and it had everything he wanted. They were expecting it to have some special features but Woody said it had a living room and a bedroom.

Chinatown.

	Woody didn't realize he was in Chinatown until the others told him. He said if anyone would know Mrs. Chung would.

questions.text: What word did Woody learn to say in Chinese?
questions.explanation:
doorknob.

	The Chinese word for doorknob is "Mén bǎshǒu".  He said he's been learning a new Chinese word everyday. When he said it to Frasier, Frasier said he had more things to worry about than the doorknob. Woody said, "You understood me." Frasier replied, "It was only a matter of time."

questions.text: What ultimatum did Lilith give Frasier?
questions.correct: Either get married or they're through
options: Either buy her a car or she moves out
Either buy her a diamond ring or they're through
Either take her to Hawaii or they're through
questions.explanation:
Either get married or they're through.

	Frasier loved Lilith but didn't like being forced to get married. He didn't know what to do and the guys at the bar were no help.

questions.text: Who did Cliff say found Frasier attractive?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Cliff got Rebecca to lick food off her face so that Frasier would see it and think  she was flirting. It worked and Frasier thought Rebecca liked him, and that he liked her back.

questions.text: What did Norm say they were when Cliff asked why they tricked Frasier like they did?
questions.explanation:
a bunch of nimrods.

	They agreed it was a terrible trick to play on Frasier but they did it cause they were nimrods. Frasier however thought that they were really being his friends.

questions.text: When Frasier asked Rebecca out, how did she respond?
options: "Why would I ever go out with a loser like you?"
questions.explanation:
"Who are you?".

	Rebecca still being relatively new to the bar, did not know who Frasier was even though she had seen him several times. Frasier realized he was tricked by the guys and quickly left feeling embarrassed.

Yes.

	Frasier left a note saying he found another woman. Frasier thought he got home in time for her not to see it, but she had seen it and was very angry.

questions.text: When Lilith "wanders the street aimlessly," what did she do?
questions.explanation:
took her usual route.

	Lilith ended up going to Cheers to confront Rebecca.

questions.text: How many times did Sam say he wanted to sleep with Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
25.

	He said, "I want to sleep with you 25 times and you don't want to sleep with me at all, so what's half of 25?" She replied, "Your IQ." They were discussing making compromises.
